path.d: m{{ connector * pad.pin_spacing }},0 a {{ pad.half_width }},{{ pad.half_width }} 0 0 1 {{ pad.full_width }},0v{{ pad.full_length - pad.full_width }} a {{ pad.half_width }},{{ pad.half_width }} 0 0 1-{{ pad.full_width }},0z m {{ clean_number((pad.full_width - pad.hole_width) / 2) }},{{ pad.centre_offset }} a {{ pad.hole_radius }},{{ pad.hole_radius }} 0 0 0 {{ pad.hole_width }},0 a {{ pad.hole_radius }},{{ pad.hole_radius }} 0 0 0-{{ pad.hole_width }},0 z
